Module eu.lilithmonodia.winestock
Package eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.database

Class PostgreSQLManager

java.lang.Object
eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.database.PostgreSQLManager
public class PostgreSQLManager extends Object
A class that manages PostgreSQL database operations for wines and assortments.

    • PostgreSQLManager

      public PostgreSQLManager(String url, String user, String password) throws SQLException
      Constructs a new PostgreSQLManager instance with the given credentials.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL for the database connection
      user - the username for the database connection
      password - the password for the database connection
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error establishing the database connection

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public Connection connect() throws SQLException
      Establishes a connection to the PostgreSQL database using the provided credentials.
      Returns:
      the Connection object representing the database connection
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error establishing the database connection

    • getAllWine

      public List<Wine> getAllWine() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all wine records from the database.
      Returns:
      a List of Wine objects representing the wine records
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while retrieving the wine records

    • insertWine

      public Optional<Long> insertWine(Wine wine) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new wine record into the database.
      Parameters:
      wine - the Wine object representing the wine to be inserted
      Returns:
      an Optional Long representing the ID of the newly inserted wine record, or an empty Optional if the insertion failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while inserting the wine record

    • getAllAssortments

      public List<Assortment<Wine>> getAllAssortments() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all Assortments from the database.
      Returns:
      a List of Assortment objects representing all the assortments in the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while retrieving the assortments

    • insertAssortment

      public Optional<Long> insertAssortment(Assortment<Wine> assortment)
      Inserts an Assortment object into the database.
      Parameters:
      assortment - the Assortment object to be inserted
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the ID of the inserted Assortment, or an empty Optional if the insertion failed

    • insertWinesInAssortment

      public void insertWinesInAssortment(@NotNull @NotNull Assortment<Wine> assortment, Long assortmentId) throws SQLException
      Inserts a list of wines into the assortment with the specified assortment ID.
      Parameters:
      assortment - the list of wines to insert
      assortmentId - the ID of the assortment to insert the wines into
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while accessing the database

    • insertWineInAssortment

      public void insertWineInAssortment(@NotNull @NotNull Wine wine, Long assortmentId) throws SQLException
      Inserts a wine into the assortment with the specified assortment ID.
      Parameters:
      wine - the wine to insert
      assortmentId - the ID of the assortment to insert the wine into
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while accessing the database

    • updateWine

      public Optional<Long> updateWine(Wine wine) throws SQLException
      Updates a wine record in the database.
      Parameters:
      wine - the Wine object representing the wine to be updated
      Returns:
      an Optional Long representing the ID of the updated wine record, or an empty Optional if the update failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while updating the wine record

      public boolean deleteWine(Wine wine) throws SQLException
      Deletes a wine record from the database.
      Parameters:
      wine - the Wine object representing the wine to be deleted
      Returns:
      an Optional Long representing the ID of the deleted wine record, or an empty Optional if the deletion failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while deleting the wine record

    • deleteAssortment

      public Optional<Long> deleteAssortment(Assortment<Wine> assortment) throws SQLException
      Deletes an assortment from the database.
      Parameters:
      assortment - the Assortment object representing the assortment to be deleted
      Returns:
      an Optional Long representing the ID of the deleted assortment, or an empty Optional if the deletion failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while deleting the assortment

      Throws:
